scripts.build: npm run build:layer && npm run build:handler
scripts.build:layer: mkdir -p dist/layer/nodejs && cp package.json dist/layer/nodejs/ && cp package-lock.json dist/layer/nodejs/ && cd dist/layer/nodejs && npm ci --omit=dev && cd .. && zip -r ../layer.zip nodejs/
scripts.build:handler: esbuild index.ts --bundle --minify --sourcemap --platform=node --target=es2020 --external:@mastra/core --external:@ai-sdk/amazon-bedrock --outfile=dist/index.js && cd dist && zip handler.zip index.js*
scripts.postbuild: echo 'Build completed: dist/layer.zip and dist/handler.zip created'
